{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Arris |model=DG860P2 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/15/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router, cable modem |fcc_id=UIDDG860AP2 |ic_id=6670A-DG860AP2 |us_id= |pwr_v=114-240 |pwr_amp=0.7 |pwr_conn=C7P |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand=Ralink |cpu2_model=RT3352 |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand=ESMT |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3352 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=DOCSIS 3.0 |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} '''SerComm''' would ''seem'' to be the manufacturer of this device.
Probable SSID format of '''ARRIS-XXXX''', encryption AES (WPA2-PSK).
The switch appears (and is assumed to be) a 10/100/1000 Broadcom chip. The Ralink chip is not identifiable from the FCC photos, but the test report notes it as a RT3352.
{{CableModemSpec |down_c=8 |up_c=4 }}
